title: Simplifi UI
content:
For questions and help with the following, please submit a SSD ticket via the Jira portal HERE . Sifi UI, Campaign Manager, Geofence, Geofinder, Geolocator, Simplifi UI.

Child Pages:
- Auth0 Login Flow (ID: 4546297874) - https://miro
- Accessing the UI - Bypass Okta (ID: 4540792894)
- Accessing the UI via Okta (ID: 4539678749) - Enter your email and click ‘Continue’ [Image] You will now be redirected to Auth0
- Accessing the UI on Your Mobile Device (ID: 4595122255)
- Revoke Foundation Manager (ID: 5233049613)


Page Labels: virtual_agent
